message.content:
My apologies, I am a text-based AI and cannot watch movies or recommend them based on my personal experience. However, some highly rated feel-good movies you can consider include:

1. The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
2. Good Will Hunting (1997)
3. Amelie (2001)
4. It's a Wonderful Life (1946)
5. The Pursuit of Happyness (2006)
6. Forrest Gump (1994)
7. Little Miss Sunshine (2006)

Again, I haven't personally watched these films but they are generally considered as inspiring and heartwarming by many people who have seen them.

Enjoy your movie night!
